description: This file defines the `Board` class for a 2048 puzzle game, managing a 4x4 grid of tiles, including operations like placing, removing, moving, merging tiles, and querying the board state.

classes.name: Board
classes.description: A class representing the game board for 2048, encapsulating a fixed 4x4 grid of tiles and providing operations related to tile placement, movement, merging, and querying the game state.

methods.name: Board.empty
methods.description: Creates an empty 4x4 board with all null tiles, starting with an initial nextId.

methods.name: Board.fromGrid
methods.description: Constructs a Board object from an existing grid (defensive copy) and a specified nextId.

methods.name: placeTile
methods.description: Returns a new Board instance with the specified tile placed at its row and column.

methods.name: removeAt
methods.description: Returns a new Board with the tile at specified row and column removed (set to null).

methods.name: getAt
methods.description: Retrieves the tile at the specified position or null if empty.

methods.name: emptyCells
methods.description: Returns a list of coordinate points representing all empty cells on the board.

methods.name: hasEmpty
methods.description: Checks if there is at least one empty cell on the board.

methods.name: containsValue
methods.description: Checks if a tile with the specified value exists on the board.

methods.name: maxTile
methods.description: Returns the maximum tile value present on the board.

methods.name: withTileMoved
methods.description: Returns a new Board with the specified tile moved to new row and column.

methods.name: replaceTwoWithMerged
methods.description: Produces a new Board with two tiles merged into a single tile at a specified position, assigning a new ID.

methods.name: spawnAt
methods.description: Creates a new tile with a given value at a specified position, assigning a new ID.

methods.name: cloneGrid
methods.description: Returns a deep clone of the grid, with tile references copied.

methods.name: hasAnyMove
methods.description: Determines if any moves are possible, either by empty space or adjacent tiles of equal value.
